import React, { useState, useEffect, useRef } from 'react'; import '../Style/Home.scss'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; export default () => { const navRef = useRef(), aboutRef = useRef(), workRef = useRef(), contactRef = useRef(); const [ backgroundColor, setBackgroundColor ] = useState('#f7f3f0'); const [ navPosition, setNavPosition ] = useState(false); const [ navActive, setNavActive ] = useState({ about: '', work: '', contact: '' }) const [ aboutAni, setAboutAni ] = useState(''); // const [ contactAni, setContactAni ] = useState(''); useEffect(() => { setTimeout(() => { setAboutAni('--active'); }, 10); navOffsetTop = navRef.current.offsetTop; aboutOffsetTop = aboutRef.current.offsetTop; workOffsetTop = workRef.current.offsetTop; contactOffsetTop = contactRef.current.offsetTop; window.addEventListener('scroll', () => { currentOffsetTop = window.pageYOffset; handleNavPosition(); handleNavEffect(); }); console.log('how many useEffect') }, []); console.log('how many outside') let currentOffsetTop = 0; let navOffsetTop = 0; let aboutOffsetTop = 0; let workOffsetTop = 0; let contactOffsetTop = 0; const handleNavPosition = () => { if(currentOffsetTop > navOffsetTop * 1.9) { setNavPosition(false); }else { setNavPosition(-currentOffsetTop * .5); } } const handleNavEffect = () => { if(currentOffsetTop > contactOffsetTop * 0.9){ setNavActive({ about: '', work: '', contact: '--active' }) }else if(currentOffsetTop > workOffsetTop * 0.9){ setNavActive({ about: '', work: '--active', contact: '' }) }else if(currentOffsetTop > aboutOffsetTop){ setNavActive({ about: '--active', work: '', contact: '' }) } } return (
